Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Hantang Cloud is a new-type comprehensive technology service provider in the cloud technology sector, established jointly by state-owned assets and the Ya'an government.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Hantang Cloud is a GPU cloud computing platform where users can rent highly cost-effective GPU cloud hosts on demand, along with attentive and efficient customer support. We are dedicated to providing high-quality hardware and software facilities for government and enterprise clients, technology, finance, AI, cloud gaming, big data, and more, aiming to save users time and money.

Cloud Era Cloud Monitoring Project:
Currently, we are a professional digital upgrade service provider and operator for the retail industry. Our focus is on providing technological upgrades and solutions to address pain points in China's 5.4 trillion yuan physical retail market, offering integrated marketing, transaction, management, and revenue enhancement solutions for convenience stores and branded chain enterprises.

Cloud Era, in collaboration with Sichuan Hantang Cloud Distributed Storage Technology Co., Ltd., is working on a product solution for the digital transformation of physical retail convenience stores. We are creating the first batch of AI-enabled stores by integrating artificial intelligence with retail stores. This involves training AI with large amounts of data to prepare for future AI-managed stores.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, North America
